SEARCH
Package model

Class Medicine

java.lang.Object
model.Medicine
public class Medicine extends Object
Represents a medicine with stock management properties such as stock level, low stock threshold, and alerts for low stock.
Since:
2024-10-26
Version:
3.4
Author:
Goh Jun Keat

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Medicine(String medicineName, int stock, int lowStockThreshold)
    Constructs a Medicine object with specified name, initial stock level, and low stock threshold.
    Medicine(String medicineName, int stock, int lowStockThreshold, boolean lowStockAlert, boolean requestAddStock)
    Constructs a Medicine object with specified properties including the low stock alert and add stock request flags.

  • Constructor Details

    • Medicine

      public Medicine(String medicineName, int stock, int lowStockThreshold)
      Constructs a Medicine object with specified name, initial stock level, and low stock threshold. Initializes the low stock alert and add stock request based on the current stock level.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - the name of the medicine
      stock - the initial stock level
      lowStockThreshold - the threshold below which stock is considered low

    • Medicine

      public Medicine(String medicineName, int stock, int lowStockThreshold, boolean lowStockAlert, boolean requestAddStock)
      Constructs a Medicine object with specified properties including the low stock alert and add stock request flags.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - the name of the medicine
      stock - the initial stock level
      lowStockThreshold - the threshold below which stock is considered low
      lowStockAlert - initial value for the low stock alert
      requestAddStock - initial value for the add stock request flag

  • Method Details

    • getMedicineName

      public String getMedicineName()
      Gets the name of the medicine.
      Returns:
      the name of the medicine

    • getStock

      public int getStock()
      Gets the current stock level of the medicine.
      Returns:
      the current stock level

    • setStock

      public void setStock(int stock)
      Sets the stock level of the medicine and checks if it triggers a low stock alert.
      Parameters:
      stock - the new stock level

    • getLowStockThreshold

      public int getLowStockThreshold()
      Gets the threshold below which the stock is considered low.
      Returns:
      the low stock threshold

    • setLowStockThreshold

      public void setLowStockThreshold(int lowStockThreshold)
      Sets the low stock threshold and checks if it triggers a low stock alert.
      Parameters:
      lowStockThreshold - the new low stock threshold

    • checkStockLevel

      public boolean checkStockLevel()
      Checks if the stock level is at or below the low stock threshold. Updates the low stock alert flag accordingly.
      Returns:
      true if the stock is below or equal to the low stock threshold; false otherwise

    • getLowStockAlert

      public boolean getLowStockAlert()
      Gets the current status of the low stock alert flag.
      Returns:
      true if the stock level is low; false otherwise

    • getRequestAddStock

      public boolean getRequestAddStock()
      Gets the status of the request to add stock.
      Returns:
      true if an add stock request has been made; false otherwise

    • setRequestAddStock

      public void setRequestAddStock()
      Sets the add stock request flag to true, indicating a request has been made to replenish stock.
